cheatsheet.name: Part I: Creating the Eclipse Browser Plug-in
cheatsheet.description: This cheat sheet helps you to create a plug-in that contributes an Eclipse Browser view to the Eclipse SDK.

cheatsheet.name: Part II: Becoming an Enabler
cheatsheet.description: This cheat sheet helps you to create an extension point to enable clients to extend the Eclipse Browser view.

cheatsheet.name: Part III: Creating the Eclipse Browser RCP Application
cheatsheet.description: This cheat sheet helps you to create a standalone, fully-branded Eclipse Browser rich client application.

cheatsheet.name: Part IV: Extending the Eclipse Browser RCP Application
cheatsheet.description: This cheat sheet helps you to create and deploy a plug-in that extends the Eclipse Browser RCP application.

category.name: Fundamentals of Plug-in and RCP Development
